Greetings,



Thank you for attending the Online Assessment.



We regret to inform that your application has not been shortlisted to the next selection stage. We appreciate the time and effort you put in on the application process.



If you are interested in joining our Club, we encourage you to visit our corporate website (www.hkjc.com) and/or follow us on LinkedIn for details of other opportunities.



Thank you for your interest in the Hong Kong Jockey Club. We wish you every success in your future endeavours.



Best regards,

Human Resources Department

The Hong Kong Jockey Club
